title: Remove serpent items
body:
There are still some leftover items used during the pirate event that don't need to be in the game or on the item list on the website. 
Please remove.

replies.body: i think he means staff of flowing water. the 3 ones that cost 0 and are called deaths daughter and the 2 others are for gangplank and not from black market brawlers
roukee is right; the items that cost Silver Serpents are for Gangplank. He gets Silver Serpents by killing units with his Q, or his barrel kills hit with Q. They are used to upgrade his Ult.
I'm not sure, but I think these are the upgrades for the Gangplank ultimate. If this is the case, they are still used and won't be removed. Sorry if you meant something else.
